net.hudup.em

Interface EM

  • All Superinterfaces:
    net.hudup.core.alg.Alg, java.io.Serializable, net.hudup.core.alg.TestingAlg
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RegressionEM
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEM, DefaultRegressionEM, DualRegressionEM, ExponentialEM, GEM, NewtonGEM

    public interface EM
extends net.hudup.core.alg.TestingAlg
    EM is the most abstract interface for all expectation maximization (EM) algorithm. Its main method is learn() used to learn parameters.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int EM_MAX_ITERATION
      Maximum number of iterations.

        static final int EM_MAX_ITERATION

        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        void setup(net.hudup.core.data.Dataset dataset,
           java.lang.Object... info)
    throws java.lang.Exception
        Setting up this EM based on specified dataset. In this current version, this method initialize the data sample for learning parameter.
        Parameters:
        dataset - specified dataset.
        info - additional parameters to set up this EM. This parameter is really an array of sub-parameters.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if any error raises.

      • unsetup

        void unsetup()
        Unset this EM. After this method is called, this EM cannot be used unless the method setup(Dataset, Object...) is called again.

      • learn

        java.lang.Object learn()
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Main method to learn parameters.
        Returns:
        the parameter to be learned.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if any error occurs.

      • getCurrentIteration

        int getCurrentIteration()
        Getting current iteration.
        Returns:
        current iteration. Return 0 if the algorithm does not run yet or run failed.

      • getCurrentParameter

        java.lang.Object getCurrentParameter()
        Getting current parameter.
        Returns:
        current parameter. Return null if the algorithm does not run yet or run failed.

      • getEstimatedParameter

        java.lang.Object getEstimatedParameter()
        Getting estimated parameter.
        Returns:
        estimated parameter. Return null if the algorithm does not run yet or run failed.

      • parameterToShownText

        java.lang.String parameterToShownText(java.lang.Object parameter)
        Convert parameter to shown text.
        Parameters:
        parameter - specified parameter.
        Returns:
        shown text converted from specified parameter.
